features: The #1 doctor recommended clinical antiperspirant brand for excessive sweating and hyperhidrosis
Clinical strength antiperspirant ingredient that doesn't require a prescription
Extra strength solid form sweat protection, with 12% Aluminum Chloride for up to 72 hours of protection against odor and perspiration
Usage instructions: Apply at night to completely dry underarms; Can be reapplied in the morning for an extra layer of freshness and protection

Please note: this antiperspirant contains a strong active ingredient designed to stop excessive sweating, and may irritate the skin when applied incorrectly; It is important to apply sparingly at nighttime, and only to completely dry underarms; Do not use immediately after showering, shaving, or on broken & irritated skin; Certified cruelty free by PETA
body.description: Certain Dri is the #1 over-the-counter brand that doctors recommend for their patients with excessive sweating and is one of the original clinical antiperspirant brands. Certain Dri offers three levels of protection to help sufferers manage their excessive sweating. Certain Dri Extra Strength Clinical Antiperspirant + Deodorant is extra-effective and may be more gentle on sensitive skin. The active ingredient Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate in Certain Dri Extra Strength Clinical has been shown to provide up to 72 hour protection for people with hyperhidrosis. PLEASE NOTE: this item is intended for people with the medical condition hyperhidrosis so it contains a strong active ingredient that may irritate the skin when applied incorrectly. It is important to apply sparingly at nighttime only to completely dry underarms. Do not use immediately after showering or shaving or on broken or irritated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used it for more than two years nd it has worked very well for me, it eliminates sweating while keeping my armpits dry.Excellet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I swear this is the only deodorant that has EVER worked for me. Once upon a time I would dread the days of forgetting, reapplying, or just plain out sweating. Them days are behind me now. I can safely enjoy upto 72hours of effects (with daily application) from just a couple swipes. I use this after a shower, before I go to sleep for the night. There is no overpowering or obnoxious scent. Which I love. At day one, this thing puts in work, and stays clocked in. Both my boyfriend and I enjoy this product and haven't needed to worry about pit stains again. Oh, I might mention that I have tested this in the hot hot HOT desert temperatures. 80 degrees, no problem, 90, not budging, 100°+, took the challenge like a champ!!! This is on my top 5 favorite products of 2023. 10 out of 10. A must buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's ok smells good baby powder. It doesn't work as ot describes. It works like any other deodorant and this product costed alot more and doesn't have much product. So, I don't think that I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of its kind
reviews.reviewText: There are some things that could certainly be improved about this deodorant, but given its specific goal of relieving persistent symptoms and the necessary ingredients they have to use, that may not be possible. The texture can be a little stiff but usually after rubbing it on your skin a little bit it starts to soften up. If you get very liberal with your application, you will notice that it combines with your sweat to cake a little bit. That seems relatively normal and if it didn't do then it probably wouldn't do its job properly when you are really really sweaty. This really isn't a deodorant that you should be using consistently. These chemicals are pretty harsh even though this one is seriously the most sensitive one I've ever found. Overtime, people are bound to complain about using harsh chemicals to stop glands from functioning. We have to think about that. I used a prescription deodorant once that made my skin sting so this one is amazing to have just a normal deodorant to apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Helps a Bunch
reviews.reviewText: Right now, this is functioning great as an antiperspirant, which is what I need it for, but it does not help with scent as much. It has only a slight baby powder smell. It also pills very quickly after applying it, leaving small clumps of product on the armpit. As of now, I'm not sure if I would repurchase before trying other brands (which I'm not familiar with, so I can't really compare).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have always struggled with sweating too much, even when I am being very healthy. It used to cause me so much embarrassment when I was a teen, and even as an adult I always opt for a top with open air to the armpits if I can help it. Now, this deodorant doesn't completely make sweat vanish, but OMG does it help SO much. Especially if I'm indoors for work, I never come home with sweat stains on my shirt anymore. The smell is a nice neutral fresh scent/powder smell, definitely very gender neutral if you're concerned about that. Sometimes if I put too much it will clump into little white balls that fall all over the place, but that is user error from years of applying too much deodorant trying to solve my sweat. Excellent anti-perspirant! Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No itching, no sweating, no redness!
reviews.reviewText: I used to buy the roll-on presentation which was great at keeping me dry for like 3-4 days before reapplying at night. The downside was that it caused me so much itching, redness and dryness. It was a a real pain! So I tried this solid option. This one does not cause me any harm. The smell is soft (Roll-on is smell-free). It doesn’t cause me itching or dryness or redness. I have to reapply every other day at night, and this is only in the middle of my armpits, where the sweat glands are. I don’t apply on the sides. I apply only once up and down, no need for more. Next day, I shower and clean my armpits as usual. Highly recommended. Best of all, it lasts forever. I bought a pack of three, enough for a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well but is not an all day deoderizer
reviews.reviewText: works pretty well for about 8 hrs
Si controla muy bien la sudoración, pero a cambio deja manchas en la ropa.
Sempre foi o meu preferido e continuarei a comprar.Recomendo a 💯.
Please read the instructions before use.
Fast delivery and really happy with the deodorant. It works very well!
I sweat just as much wearing this as any normal brand of antiperspirant/deodorant. It’s not worth paying the Amazon shipping fee to get the same results as a drugstore deodorant.
